xwikidoc.name: WebHome
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.panjl
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.creiswig
xwikidoc.content:
1 GAWLP Documentation 1.1 $msg.get("This is the Documentation for the AdWordsJump Landing Page") 1.1.1 The AdWordsJump module contains these resources 1. AdWordsJump/AdWordsInfoClass 1. AdWordsJump/LandingPageLog (updated for Phase II - new display format, no change on store format) 1. AdWordsJump/LandingPageLogExport 1. AdWordsJump/LandingPageLogTemplate (updated for Phase II) 1. AdWordsJump/LandingPageTemplate 1. AdWordsJump/TestLandingPage (a sample page for Landing page) 1. AdWordsJump/Translations 1. AdWordsJump/WebPreferences 1. AdWordsJump/LandingPageLogWriter (updated for Phase II) 1. AdWordsJump/TemplateJS (updated for Phase II) 1. AdWordsJump/AdWordsJumpPageTemplate
*A complete list of AdWords Landing Pages can be found at [AdWordsJump.URLindex]*
1.1.1 To create a new AdWordsJump Landing page, the following must occur: 1.1.1.1 Step 1 (Engineering Only) First, import the resources above into the system. 1.1.1.1 Step 2 (Engineering Only) Add AdWordsJump Translation file 'AdWordsJump.Translations' to 'Internationalization Document Bundles. Use this url '/xwiki/bin/admin/XWiki/XWikiPreferences', the 'Internationalization Document Bundles' is under 'Programming'. 1.1.1.1 Step 3 Create an AdWordsJump Landing page, for example, AdWordsJump.FreeWorksheet, then configure the page using the tools created in multiple phases of implementation: a. [Create a Landing Page using the original (Phase 1) Zaner/Pan template|CreateGAWLP] a. [Create a Landing Page using the Phase 1 Search module|CreateGAWLPSearchOnly] a. [Create a Landing Page using the configurable features from Phase 2|CreateGAWLPPhaseII] a. [Create a Landing Page containing the Registration Form|CreateGAWLPJoin] 1.1.1.1 Step 4 Now you can view the new Landing page from the url "/xwiki/bin/view/AdWordsJump/FreeWorksheet?xpage=popup", where FreeWorksheet is the replaced with the name of page you created. Remember, to view your Ad correctly, add '?xpage=popup' at the end of you URL. The search content will be recorded in the system automatically. 1.1.1.1 Step 5 You can view search records in the log page with the url "/xwiki/bin/view/AdWordsJump/LandingPageLog" or click here [Google Ad Reports>AdWordsJump.LandingPageLog]. This page contains all the Landing page logs, you can click each Landing page to its log.
1.1.1 Page rights * AdWordsInfoClass and LandingPageTemplate should be visible by guests * LandingPageLog,LandingPageLogTemplate,LandingPageTemplate, LandingPageLogExport and AdWordsJumpPageTemplate should have programming rights
